Guangba Yu

Postdoctoral Researcher, CUHK

I am a postdoctoral researcher in ARISE Lab at The Chinese University of Hong Kong, mentored by Prof. Michael R. Lyu. Previously, I obtained my Ph.d and M.Eng degrees from Sun Yat-sen University, supervised by Prof.Pengfei Chen.
I have awarded Tencent Rhino-Bird Research Elite Program in 2022. I was a Ph.D. software engineering student researcher at WeChat in 2022, mentored by Yuetang Deng.
üòÉ I always welcome the opportunity to collaborate research topics about system reliability. Feel free to drop me an email if you're interested in connecting with me.
